codeTools.name: NOI Margin
codeTools.description: Net Operating Income as a percentage of total revenue

codeTools.name: DSCR
codeTools.description: Debt Service Coverage Ratio - measures ability to cover debt payments

codeTools.name: Cap Rate
codeTools.description: Capitalization rate indicating return on investment

codeTools.name: Cash-on-Cash
codeTools.description: Annual pre-tax cash flow relative to total cash invested

codeTools.name: Effective Occupancy
codeTools.description: Collected rent as percentage of gross potential rent

codeTools.name: Levered IRR
codeTools.description: Internal Rate of Return with debt financing

codeTools.name: Equity Multiple
codeTools.description: Total distributions divided by total equity invested

codeTools.name: Rent Growth YoY
Loss-to-Lease
codeTools.description: Difference between market rent and in-place rent

codeTools.name: Break-Even Occupancy
codeTools.description: Minimum occupancy to cover operating expenses and debt

externalTools.name: Web Search
externalTools.description: Search the web for market data and news
externalTools.detail: Query Google, Bing, and specialized real estate sources for market reports, news articles, transaction data, and competitive intelligence.
externalTools.useCase: Research market trends. Find recent sales comps. Monitor competitor activity. Get news on specific properties or markets.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ CBRE Report: "Austin Multifamily Q4 2024"
‚Ä¢ CoStar: 320-unit complex sold for $85M (Jan 2024)
‚Ä¢ Apartments.com: Rent growth +2.1% YoY

externalTools.name: Document Parser
externalTools.description: AI-powered extraction from PDFs and spreadsheets
externalTools.detail: Upload rent rolls, T-12s, operating statements, or lease abstracts. AI extracts structured data automatically.
externalTools.useCase: Parse rent rolls for unit mix analysis. Extract P&L data from operating statements. Digitize lease abstracts for DD.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Property: Sunset Apartments
‚Ä¢ Total 248 units, 94.8% occupied
‚Ä¢ Avg rent: $1,650/mo
‚Ä¢ 32 leases expiring Aug 2024

externalTools.name: CoStar API
externalTools.description: Real-time property and market data from CoStar
externalTools.detail: Access CoStar's comprehensive database of commercial real estate properties, including multifamily. Get rent comps, sales history, and market analytics.
externalTools.useCase: Pull comp set for valuations. Research submarket trends. Get building specs and ownership history.
externalTools.exampleInput: Query: Multifamily comps in Buckhead, Atlanta
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ 15 properties found
‚Ä¢ Avg rent: $2,150/unit
‚Ä¢ Avg cap rate: 5.2%
‚Ä¢ Vacancy: 4.8%

externalTools.name: Yardi Voyager
externalTools.detail: Direct integration with Yardi Voyager for real-time rent rolls, financials, and tenant data. Bi-directional sync available.
externalTools.useCase: Pull live rent rolls. Sync financial data. Export reports to Yardi.
externalTools.exampleInput: Fetch rent roll for Sunset Gardens
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ 248 units synced
‚Ä¢ Last updated: 2 min ago
‚Ä¢ 6 move-outs pending
‚Ä¢ $412K collected MTD

externalTools.name: RealPage Analytics
externalTools.detail: Connect to RealPage for AI-powered pricing recommendations, demand forecasts, and competitive positioning data.
externalTools.useCase: Optimize pricing strategy. Forecast demand. Benchmark against market.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Current: $1,850
‚Ä¢ Recommended: $1,925 (+4%)
‚Ä¢ Market avg: $1,900
‚Ä¢ Demand score: 85/100

externalTools.name: Argus Enterprise
externalTools.detail: Build institutional-grade cash flow models with Argus Enterprise integration. Export to/from ARGUS format.
externalTools.useCase: Underwrite acquisitions. Create LP reporting packages. Run sensitivity analysis.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Year 5 NOI: $5.2M
‚Ä¢ IRR: 16.3%
‚Ä¢ Equity Multiple: 2.1x
‚Ä¢ Profit: $12.4M

externalTools.name: Zillow API
externalTools.detail: Access Zillow's residential property database for comps, Zestimates, and neighborhood data. Useful for value-add opportunities.
externalTools.useCase: Research condo conversion potential. Get neighborhood demographics. Analyze single-family comps.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Zestimate: $485,000
‚Ä¢ Rent Zestimate: $2,100/mo
‚Ä¢ Last sale: $420K (2021)
‚Ä¢ YoY change: +8.2%

externalTools.name: Census Bureau API
externalTools.detail: Access US Census Bureau data for population demographics, income levels, employment data, and housing statistics by geography.
externalTools.useCase: Analyze target demographics. Research market growth. Support investment thesis.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Population: 12,450
‚Ä¢ Median HHI: $92,500
‚Ä¢ Median age: 34
‚Ä¢ Renters: 68%
‚Ä¢ Growth 5yr: +18%

externalTools.name: Email Sender
externalTools.detail: Send scheduled or triggered emails with formatted reports, charts, and data. Supports templates and distribution lists.
externalTools.useCase: Weekly portfolio summary to LPs. Alert when KPI thresholds breached. DD reminders.
externalTools.exampleInput: Send weekly report to LP investors
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Recipients: 12
‚Ä¢ Sent: Done
‚Ä¢ Open rate: 75% (9 opened)

externalTools.name: SQL Query Engine
externalTools.description: Direct database queries with natural language
externalTools.detail: Convert natural language questions to SQL and query the data lakehouse directly. Returns formatted results.
externalTools.useCase: Ad-hoc analysis. Custom reports. Data exploration.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ 3 properties found:
  - Oak Ridge (87.2%)
  - River Walk (89.1%)
  - Metro Lofts (88.5%)

externalTools.name: Python Executor
externalTools.description: Run Python scripts for custom analysis
externalTools.detail: Execute Python code with pandas, numpy, and scikit-learn for custom data analysis, ML models, and advanced calculations.
externalTools.useCase: Custom analytics. ML predictions. Data transformations.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Model: ARIMA(2,1,2)
‚Ä¢ Prediction: 94.7%
‚Ä¢ Confidence: 92%
‚Ä¢ Trend: Stable

externalTools.name: Google Maps API
externalTools.detail: Geocoding, distance calculations, and location-based analytics. Plot properties on maps with custom markers.
externalTools.useCase: Analyze property locations. Calculate commute times. Map comp set.
externalTools.exampleOutput:
‚Ä¢ Distance: 4.2 miles
‚Ä¢ Drive time: 12 min
‚Ä¢ Transit: 25 min
‚Ä¢ Walk score: 78

visualizationTools.name: Line Chart
visualizationTools.description: Time-series data visualization with trend lines
visualizationTools.detail: Display data points connected over time. Ideal for showing trends, patterns, and changes. Supports multiple series, area fills, and annotations.
visualizationTools.useCase: Track KPI trends over time. Compare year-over-year performance. Identify seasonal patterns.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Monthly Net Operating Income over 12 months with YoY comparison

visualizationTools.name: Area Chart
visualizationTools.description: Stacked area visualization for cumulative trends
visualizationTools.detail: Show how multiple data series combine over time. Great for visualizing portfolio composition changes or cumulative metrics.
visualizationTools.useCase: Revenue breakdown over time. Portfolio growth by region. Expense composition trends.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Monthly revenue by source stacked to show total and composition

visualizationTools.name: Heatmap
visualizationTools.detail: Display values across two dimensions using color gradients. Great for identifying patterns, outliers, and geographic distributions.
visualizationTools.useCase: Geographic performance analysis. Correlation matrices. Occupancy across time and regions.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Portfolio-wide occupancy rates color-coded by state

visualizationTools.name: Pie Chart
visualizationTools.detail: Show composition and relative sizes of categories. Donut variant available for center statistics. Best for 2-6 categories.
visualizationTools.useCase: Revenue composition. Expense breakdown. Unit mix distribution.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Income sources: Base Rent, Utilities, Parking, Other

visualizationTools.name: Bar Chart
visualizationTools.detail: Display categorical data with horizontal or vertical bars. Supports grouped, stacked, and comparison modes.
visualizationTools.useCase: Compare properties. Budget vs actual. In-place vs market rents.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: In-place rents compared to market rates by unit type

visualizationTools.name: Scatter Plot
visualizationTools.detail: Plot data points on X-Y axes to reveal correlations, clusters, and outliers. Bubble size can represent third dimension.
visualizationTools.useCase: Risk-return analysis. Property benchmarking. Cap rate vs NOI margin.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Properties plotted by Cap Rate vs NOI Margin with bubble size by AUM

visualizationTools.name: Gauge Chart
visualizationTools.description: Display single value against a target range
visualizationTools.detail: Show a metric's current value with color zones indicating performance (red/yellow/green). Great for dashboards and KPI monitoring.
visualizationTools.useCase: Occupancy targets. DSCR thresholds. Budget utilization.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Current portfolio occupancy vs target with performance zones

visualizationTools.name: Waterfall Chart
visualizationTools.detail: Show how an initial value is affected by positive and negative changes. Perfect for P&L breakdowns and variance analysis.
visualizationTools.useCase: NOI bridge analysis. Budget variance. Cash flow waterfall.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Revenue to NOI breakdown showing income and expense impacts

visualizationTools.name: Radar Chart
visualizationTools.detail: Compare entities across multiple metrics simultaneously. Each spoke represents a different dimension.
visualizationTools.useCase: Property scoring. Competitive analysis. Investment criteria matching.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Property rated across Location, Quality, Returns, Risk, Growth

visualizationTools.name: Treemap
visualizationTools.detail: Display hierarchical data where rectangle size represents value. Shows both structure and relative magnitude.
visualizationTools.useCase: Portfolio allocation. Expense categories. Regional revenue distribution.
visualizationTools.exampleDescription: Properties sized by AUM, grouped by region
